3 namespace Ubiquity\controllers;
4 
5 use Ubiquity\cache\CacheManager;
6 use Ubiquity\utils\http\URequest;
7 use Ubiquity\utils\base\UString;
8 use Ubiquity\log\Logger;
9 use Ubiquity\controllers\traits\RouterModifierTrait;
10 use Ubiquity\controllers\traits\RouterAdminTrait;
11 use Ubiquity\controllers\traits\RouterTestTrait;
12 
22 class Router extends RouterModifierTrait,RouterAdminTrait,RouterTestTrait {
23  protected static $routes;
24 
25  private static function cleanParam($param) {
26  if (UString::endswith ( $param, "/" ))
27  return \substr ( $param, 0, - 1 );
28  return $param;
29  }
30 
31  private static function getRoute_(&$routeDetails, $routePath, $matches, $cachedResponse) {
32  if (! isset ( $routeDetails ["controller"] )) {
33  $method = URequest::getMethod ();
34  if (isset ( $routeDetails [$method] )) {
35  $routeDetailsMethod = $routeDetails [$method];
36  return self::getRouteUrlParts ( [ "path" => $routePath,"details" => $routeDetailsMethod ], $matches, $routeDetailsMethod ["cache"] ?? false, $routeDetailsMethod ["duration"] ?? null, $cachedResponse );
37  }
38  } else {
39  return self::getRouteUrlParts ( [ "path" => $routePath,"details" => $routeDetails ], $matches, $routeDetails ["cache"] ?? false, $routeDetails ["duration"] ?? null, $cachedResponse );
40  }
41  return false;
42  }
43 
44  protected static function _getURL($routePath, $params) {
45  $result = \preg_replace_callback ( '~\((.*?)\)~', function () use (&$params) {
46  return array_shift ( $params );
47  }, $routePath );
48  if (\sizeof ( $params ) > 0) {
49  $result = \rtrim ( $result, '/' ) . '/' . \implode ( '/', $params );
50  }
51  return $result;
52  }
53 
54  protected static function checkRouteName($routeDetails, $name) {
55  if (! isset ( $routeDetails ["name"] )) {
56  foreach ( $routeDetails as $methodRouteDetail ) {
57  if (isset ( $methodRouteDetail ["name"] ) && $methodRouteDetail == $name)
58  return true;
59  }
60  }
61  return isset ( $routeDetails ["name"] ) && $routeDetails ["name"] == $name;
62  }
63 
64  protected static function setParamsInOrder(&$routeUrlParts, $paramsOrder, $params) {
65  $index = 0;
66  foreach ( $paramsOrder as $order ) {
67  if ($order === '*') {
68  if (isset ( $params [$index] ))
69  $routeUrlParts = \array_merge ( $routeUrlParts, \array_diff ( \explode ( "/", $params [$index] ), [ "" ] ) );
70  break;
71  }
72  if ($order [0] === '~') {
73  $order = \intval ( \substr ( $order, 1, 1 ) );
74  if (isset ( $params [$order] )) {
75  $routeUrlParts = \array_merge ( $routeUrlParts, \array_diff ( \explode ( "/", $params [$order] ), [ "" ] ) );
76  break;
77  }
78  }
79  $routeUrlParts [] = self::cleanParam ( $params [$order] );
80  unset ( $params [$order] );
81  $index ++;
82  }
83  }
84 
88  public static function start() {
89  self::$routes = CacheManager::getControllerCache ();
90  }
91 
95  public static function startRest() {
96  self::$routes = CacheManager::getControllerCache ( true );
97  }
98 
102  public static function startAll() {
103  self::$routes = array_merge ( CacheManager::getControllerCache (), CacheManager::getControllerCache ( true ) );
104  }
105 
113  public static function getRoute($path, $cachedResponse = true) {
114  $path = self::slashPath ( $path );
115  if (isset ( self::$routes [$path] )) {
116  return self::getRoute_ ( self::$routes [$path], $path, [ $path ], $cachedResponse );
117  }
118  foreach ( self::$routes as $routePath => $routeDetails ) {
119  if (preg_match ( "@^" . $routePath . "$@s", $path, $matches )) {
120  if (($r = self::getRoute_ ( $routeDetails, $routePath, $matches, $cachedResponse )) !== false) {
121  return $r;
122  }
123  }
124  }
125  Logger::warn ( "Router", "No route found for {$path}", "getRoute" );
126  return false;
127  }
128 
136  public static function getRouteByName($name, $parameters = [], $absolute = true) {
137  foreach ( self::$routes as $routePath => $routeDetails ) {
138  if (self::checkRouteName ( $routeDetails, $name )) {
139  if (\sizeof ( $parameters ) > 0)
140  $routePath = self::_getURL ( $routePath, $parameters );
141  if (! $absolute)
142  return \ltrim ( $routePath, '/' );
143  else
144  return $routePath;
145  }
146  }
147  return false;
148  }
149 
158  public static function path($name, $parameters = [], $absolute = false) {
159  return self::getRouteByName ( $name, $parameters, $absolute );
160  }
161 
169  public static function url($name, $parameters = []) {
170  return URequest::getUrl ( self::getRouteByName ( $name, $parameters, false ) );
171  }
172 
173  public static function getRouteUrlParts($routeArray, $params, $cached = false, $duration = NULL, $cachedResponse = true) {
174  \array_shift ( $params );
175  $routeDetails = $routeArray ["details"];
176  if (is_callable ( $routeDetails ["controller"] )) {
177  $result = [ $routeDetails ["controller"] ];
178  $resultStr = "callable function";
179  } else {
180  $result = [ str_replace ( "\\\\", "\\", $routeDetails ["controller"] ),$routeDetails ["action"] ];
181  $resultStr = implode ( "/", $result );
182  }
183  if (($paramsOrder = $routeDetails ["parameters"]) && (sizeof ( $paramsOrder ) > 0)) {
184  self::setParamsInOrder ( $result, $paramsOrder, $params );
185  }
186  if (! $cached || ! $cachedResponse) {
187  Logger::info ( 'Router', sprintf ( 'Route found for %s : %s', $routeArray ["path"], $resultStr ), 'getRouteUrlParts' );
188  return $result;
189  }
190  Logger::info ( 'Router', sprintf ( 'Route found for %s (from cache) : %s', $routeArray ["path"], $resultStr ), 'getRouteUrlParts' );
191  return CacheManager::getRouteCache ( $routeArray ["path"], $result, $duration );
192  }
193 
200  public static function slashPath($path) {
201  if (UString::startswith ( $path, "/" ) === false)
202  $path = "/" . $path;
203  if (! UString::endswith ( $path, "/" ))
204  $path = $path . "/";
205  return $path;
206  }
207 
213  public static function setExpired($routePath) {
214  CacheManager::setExpired ( $routePath );
215  }
216 
222  public static function getRoutes() {
223  return self::$routes;
224  }
225 }
